name: Deploy to Cloud Run
description: Deploy Python application to Google Cloud Run using gcloud CLI
prompt:
Deploy this Python application to Google Cloud Run using the Google Cloud CLI. Please:

1. Check if gcloud CLI is installed and authenticated
2. Build and deploy the application to Cloud Run
3. Use appropriate Cloud Run configuration for a Python application
4. Set up necessary environment variables and service configuration
5. Provide the deployed service URL

Ensure the deployment follows Google Cloud Run best practices for Python applications.
